text: geudaedeul jung nugunga-ege jug-eum-i chaj-a ogi jeon-e geudaedeul-eun naega geudaedeul-ege bepun yangsig-eulo huisahala. geu ttae geuga malhal geos-ini “jeoui junim. jeoleul gakkaun gihankkajiman neujchueo jusindamyeon jeoneun jinsillo jaseon-eul bepulgo seonlyanghan jadeul jung-ui hanaga doel geos-ibnida”
